titleStmt.title: To the High Court of Parliament. A dilemma, from a parallel. Humbly presented. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Edwards, Thomas, 1599-1647,
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes this to Thomas Edwards.

Printed in two columns. The left contains selections from Edwards' "Gangræna"; the right, selections from various documents by Charles I. The anonymous author of the postscript uses the parallel to criticize Edwards.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
